entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
